
XwaOptEditor runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.5.
(Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, or superior)

XwaOptExplorer runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.5.
(Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, or superior)

OptStructure runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.5.
(Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, or superior)

OptTextures runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.5.
(Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, or superior)

XwaHangarMapEditor runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.5.
(Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, or superior)

XwaOptProfilesViewer runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.5.
(Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, or superior)

XwaSFoilsEditor runs on Windows 32/64 bits with the .NET framework 4.5.
(Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, or superior)
